tourInfo.name: Educational Tour 2024
tourInfo.college: Kamani Science and Prataprai Arts College, Amreli
tourInfo.emergencyInstructions: In case of emergency: 1. Stay calm. 2. Immediately contact faculty incharge. 3. Follow safety protocols. 4. Do not panic or spread rumors. 5. Help fellow students if safe to do so.

itinerary.purpose: Visit to Science City and IT companies
itinerary.educationalRelevance: Understanding practical applications of computer science in research facilities and industry
itinerary.travelNotes: College bus departure at 06:00 from main gate. Estimated travel time: 2 hours. Breakfast will be provided on bus.
itinerary.importantNotes: Carry college ID, water bottle, and notebook. Dress code: College uniform.

itinerary.purpose: Visit to Government Technology Park and e-Governance centers
itinerary.educationalRelevance: Exposure to government IT infrastructure and e-governance projects relevant to BCA curriculum
itinerary.travelNotes: Travel by hired bus. Carry water bottles and snacks. Lunch will be arranged at government canteen.
itinerary.importantNotes: Formal dress required. Photography may be restricted in some areas.

itinerary.educationalRelevance: Networking with other institutions and understanding industrial applications
itinerary.travelNotes: Early departure. Overnight stay arranged at college guest house.
itinerary.importantNotes: Overnight stay. Pack necessary overnight items.

itinerary.purpose: Diamond industry IT systems and textile manufacturing automation
itinerary.educationalRelevance: Understanding ERP systems and automation in traditional industries
itinerary.travelNotes: Long travel day. Return journey starts at 16:00.
itinerary.importantNotes: Final day of visits. Collect all certificates and feedback forms.

healthAlerts.instructions: Keep away from dust. Help use inhaler if breathing difficulty.
Avoid nut products. Administer antihistamines if reaction occurs.

firstAid: For minor cuts: Clean with antiseptic wipe and apply bandage
For fever: Provide paracetamol (if available) and monitor temperature
For dehydration: Provide ORS solution and rest in shade
For asthma attack: Help use inhaler, keep in sitting position, call faculty immediately
For allergic reaction: Administer antihistamines, monitor breathing, seek medical help
For heat stroke: Move to cool place, provide water, cool with wet cloth
For sprains: Rest, Ice, Compression, Elevation (RICE method)
Emergency: Call 108 immediately for any serious condition
guidelines: Always travel in groups of at least 3 students
Carry college ID card at all times
Report any unusual incident immediately to faculty
Stay hydrated and protect from sun exposure
Follow traffic rules when crossing roads
Keep emergency numbers saved in phone
Inform faculty before leaving group for any reason
Follow COVID-19 safety protocols if applicable

documents.title: College Tour Rules and Regulations
documents.content:
1. All students must maintain discipline throughout the tour.
2. College uniform must be worn during official visits.
3. Attendance is mandatory for all scheduled activities.
4. No student shall leave the group without faculty permission.
5. Alcohol and tobacco consumption is strictly prohibited.
6. Respect local culture and traditions.
7. Damage to property will be penalized.
8. Follow instructions of faculty and student leaders.

documents.title: Emergency Protocol
documents.content:
IN CASE OF EMERGENCY:

1. STAY CALM - Do not panic
2. ASSESS THE SITUATION - Check for immediate dangers
3. CONTACT FACULTY - Immediately inform faculty incharge
4. CALL EMERGENCY SERVICES - Dial 108 for ambulance, 100 for police
5. PROVIDE FIRST AID - If trained and safe to do so
6. SECURE THE AREA - Keep other students safe
7. DOCUMENT INCIDENT - Note details for reporting
8. INFORM COLLEGE - Contact college office if serious

EMERGENCY CONTACTS MUST BE MEMORIZED BY ALL LEADERS.

documents.title: Student Code of Conduct
documents.content:
As representatives of Kamani Science and Prataprai Arts College, students shall:

1. Maintain high standards of behavior
2. Respect faculty, staff, and fellow students
3. Be punctual for all activities
4. Keep accommodation areas clean
5. Conserve resources (water, electricity)
6. Use appropriate language at all times
7. Report any concerns to faculty
8. Participate actively in all educational activities

documents.title: Health and Hygiene Guidelines
documents.content:
1. Wash hands regularly with soap
2. Drink only bottled or purified water
3. Eat at clean, reputable establishments
4. Carry necessary medications
5. Use sunscreen and stay hydrated
6. Report any health issues immediately
7. Get adequate rest during tour
8. Maintain personal hygiene standards
